pages.title: Where to find
pages.text: There are 3 different kinds of impenetrable structures hidden at around y=0 in the Overworld in any biome. They seem to be built from an unbreakable stone.

pages.title: Blue Hearts
pages.text: The entrance seems to be blocked by a powerful forcefield. Whoever built those was kind enough to leave you clues, however! The hearts on the forcefields sides seem to indicate you have to have Azure Dike active.

pages.title: Colored Spore Blossoms
pages.text: The Colored Spore Blossoms at the ceiling and the engravings behind them on the walls seem to hint at the solution. A Powder engraving and a '? + ?'. You have to mix powders?

pages.title: Bedrock Seal
pages.text: Is there a way to crack open the Bedrock? After you get in, best to take a look at the corresponding pages in your book of everything you find there. Always good to have some dyes with you.
